page.title: 14LIFE STYLE
page.content: I am Darren .I woke at 8am after my alarm.For breakfast I had cereal ,toast,orange squash.I am wearing long corduroy,vest,shirt,pullover and bodywarmer.I walk to school in 5 minutes.We have religious assembly at 9am and today we go to the other classroom (126 metres away)for our maths.After 15 minutes play,we start at 11am class library and then English language writing. At 12 noon we go for cooked school dinners;some bring sandwiches.We play at school until 1.15 pm.Today we did our study project work in books we made ourselves.Afternoon play is 2.30pm to 2.45 pm.After, we had sports practice.We finish at 3.45 pm.I go on my bike until my tea,then watch television,then crisps and bread for supper,then bed at 9 pm.
